title: Hi, I’m Andrea!
text: I am a Year 3 student in NUS with a major in Chemistry and minors in Forensic Science and Interactive Media Development. I am interested in the consumer goods industry and enjoy crafts and puzzles in my free time. Feel free to navigate this website to learn more about myself and the works I have done!

title: MY Planner
text:
Description


This is an idea I generated with 2 of my peers. It is a brush supported with AI, used to analyse the user’s hair and scalp to provide further recommendations.


Pitch

Video

Documentation

title: The Smell of Fear
text:
Description


This is a data story that aims to answer whether a smell of fear exists. It communicates insights from the data source named “The Smell of Fear”.
I created it as a part of my final project in the module NM2207 Computational Media Literacy. In the module, I learned to use R for data analysis and visualisation. Using the tools gained and further exploration of my own, I created this final project.


Product

title: MY Planner
text:
Description


This is a web application I developed in 2021 as my final project in the online course - CS50x. It is a digital planner designed to ease users’ daily planning of activities, down to the minute.
